detectors.description:
EgregeumFinance.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EgregeumFinance.sol#280-285) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EgregeumFinance.sol#282)
